info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 6:47PM EDT until May 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR EASTERN KANKAKEE...NORTHEASTERN IROQUOIS...NORTHWESTERN NEWTON AND SOUTHWESTERN LAKE COUNTIES... At 546 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hopkins Park, or near Lake Village, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A personal weather station measured a 73 mph wind gust near Kentland earlier with these storms. Wind gusts in excess of 60 mph remain possible. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Manteno, Momence, Lake Village, Grant Park, Hopkins Park, Sun River Terrace, Schneider and Sumava Resorts. This includes... US 41 Dragway. Including the following interstate... I-57 between mile markers 323 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
